subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James will unquestionably be the No. 1 target of the Knicks if he becomes a free agent. But the list of potential free agents in 2010 is deep and spectacular.
snippet: LeBron James will unquestionably be the No. 1 target of the Knicks if he becomes a free agent. But the list of potential free agents in 2010 is deep and spectacular.
